events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering team due to your extensive experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and technical skills related to the software engineer role.
Thank you for the detailed answers during the screening; your enthusiasm for software development is very encouraging.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th, where you will solve coding challenges and system design questions.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong software engineering capabilities and problem-solving skills.
We have arranged an HR interview on May 7th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
The HR interview went well, and we appreciate your openness and enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
We are pleased to present you with an offer for the software engineer role, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback about the offer; we are excited about the possibility of you joining our team.
You have accepted the offer, and we look forward to welcoming you as a new software engineer in our company.
Your onboarding process has begun; we have scheduled sessions to introduce you to our engineering tools and workflows.
The hiring process is officially closed, and you are now a full-time member of our engineering department.
